name: Natur-Stellplatz Villa Tudela
title: (30879) Natur-Stellplatz Villa Tudela
description: Nature parking space Villa Tudela. Separated area for campers who are looking for peace and nature on the area of a finca. Great view of almond, fig and olive trees and the surrounding mountains. Observe wild rabbits, red partridge and sometimes eagles. Camping behavior expressly desired. “You should be able to enjoy camping on our pitch and have enough space.” After the harvest, organically grown, cold-pressed olive oil can be purchased from the nearby farmer. Swiss owners look forward to your visit (language: German, French, English). Voluntary fee for the maintenance and care of the parking spaces. Please inquire in advance by phone or Whatsapp. If possible, send a photo of your caravan so that we can clarify whether a suitable place is free for you. Open October to March. Visits outside the opening times are possible, but only by prior arrangement.

Access via orchards with winding roads, but with caution. Very stony and bumpy driveway to the beach. Large Concorde 6 wheeler parked so access is good but bumpy. The BP garage in Mazarrón offers gray waste and fresh water for a small fee. nice place.

name: Los Olivos Camper Park
title: (30396) Los Olivos Camper Park
description:
Área de autocaravanas, caravanas y campers en plena naturaleza, a 14 kilómetros de Cartagena y 20  km de las playas de La Azohía y Mazarrón. 
Se admiten mascotas.
Disponemos de aseos y duchas con agua caliente. 
El área está cerrada y videovigilado. 
Ofrecemos WIFI gratis. 

OPEN from September 15th to May 31th 
CLOSED from the 1st June until September the 14th.

address.street: Casas Los Albañiles, 6. Los Puertos de Santa Bárbara de Abajo

title: (30320) Fuente Alamo - 3 Calle Sevilla Moreno
description: Very simple parking, a little off the main traffic. Quiet even if not very glamorous. Nearby there are also plenty of places to park for free if you don't like this parking lot. We stayed here for one night with our van on a Sunday evening.

title: (30396) Cartagena - Pasaje los Albaladejos, 12
description:
Small, very quiet and wonderfully located private area with a maximum of three camper spots. From our location you can enjoy great walking and cycling. We are happy to help you with beautiful and challenging routes, both for full day trips and short circular walks.

Our site is located on a 400 meter long, unpaved but easily accessible road in the middle of the campo of Cartagena in Murcia, the region east of Andalusia. You have a view of the very photogenic Acueducto de Perín and the mountains of the Sierra de la Muela, Cabo Tiñoso y Roldán Natural Park. The historic port city of Cartagena is a 15-minute drive away, where you can shop well and enjoy good food and drinks. Also a fifteen minute drive away is the small but fine (nude) beach of El Portus.

Because we find peace and nature experience very important, we only allow three campers with a maximum length of 6.50 meters or a maximum of 3.5 tons or three camper vans per night. Unfortunately, due to the fragility of the terrain, we cannot allow heavier campers. No standard 'fixed' places with us, but all the freedom to stand between the olive, lemon and orange trees in our beautifully landscaped 'garden'. We can arrange groceries for you in consultation.

Reservation of a spot only by phone or e-mail, because we are not always present. Minimum stay two nights! In addition to Dutch, we also speak English, German, Spanish and a little bit of French. In consultation you can use our outdoor pool. On the site you will find two hot showers and two toilets that were completely renovated in February 2023. Our site is well secured with a fence and electronic entrance gate with its own access code, so that you can safely leave your valuables. Wi-Fi is free to use. A refrigerator and (dishwashing) kitchen are also available free of charge. You can use a washing machine for a fee. In principle, we do not allow dogs. Only small dogs, provided they are always on a leash, are allowed with the owner.
If you want something different .... on our site there is also a fully renovated, very comfortable log cabin that we are happy to offer for a minimum of three nights. With private shower, kitchen and toilet. You cannot dispose of black or gray water on our site. Before you reach us, you have the option of discharging it for free (!) at the BP station Cuesta Blanca, 3 km away. We are happy to send you a Google Maps pin when you book.

title: (30876) Lorca - 28 Diseminado Garrobillo
description: One of the many possible places along the coast to Cap Cope very popular in winter by northern Europeans who are permanently installed with large buses. Coastal track also accessible by van. A treat for mountain biking.

title: (30396) Cartagena - RM-E26 Cuesta Blanca - Perín /Pasaje Los Llanos 17 / Carretera de la Corona 17
title_short: (30396) Cartagena - RM-E26 Cuesta Blanca - Perín /Pasaje Los Llanos 17 / Carretera de la Corona 17
description: SenS sleep: small camper place on the tennis court! With a great view over the hills everywhere, where you can enjoy walking and cycling. Campers can be up to 8 meters long and weigh up to 4500 kilos. Maximum 2 pets. Loading/unloading/showering/dishwashing only possible for guests. Checkout in cash. Various suppliers come to the motorhome: bread, fruit, vegetables, cheese, meat, fish, drinks and much more. John and Saskia, the owners, are Dutch and speak English, German, Spanish and a little French.

address.street: RM-E26 Cuesta Blanca - Perín /Pasaje Los Llanos 17 / Carretera de la Corona 17

title: (30849) Alhama de Murcia - RM-E24
description: C'est un lieu en pleine nature bien tranquille pour une nuit

title: (30396) Cartagena - 41 Lugar Molino Tio Jarapa
description: Service station with a large area for motorhomes, located in Cuesta Blanca 10 minutes from the city with shopping centers and 10 minutes from natural beaches, in a rural setting where you can enjoy clean air and spectacular sunsets. It has a 24 / h video surveillance parking , emptying and filling of water for a fee, if you consume 35 liters of fuel the filling is free. OPENING PROMOTION, JUNE AND JULY THE PARKING WILL BE FREE WITH THE CONSUMPTION OF 35 LITERS OF FUEL.

title: (30876) Lorca - 23 N-332
description: Good lunch or overnight stop on what was the old road before a new bridge and road section built. Incredibly beautiful views, road doesn't carry much traffic so no noise problem.

title: (30397) Cartagena -
description: Good place for small vehicles. Steep, narrow and dusty access road. There are grill places, some flat spaces there. And at the top, next to the chapel, there is also a flat area. Up there, there is noise from the Sabic factory but the view is pretty. Lower is calm. Note: Be careful on the platform next to the chapel, avoid the small metal bars coming out of the concrete. No shade, no services. It takes the agreement of the owner to stay there.

title: (30393) Cartagena - 15 Lugar Pie de la Muela
title_short: (30393) Cartagena - 15 Lugar Pie de la Muela
description: Hiking parking lot, a little sloping, gravelly, at the end of a village, surrounded by forest, very quiet, little light pollution, therefore great starry sky. Ok for 1 night.

name: Espacio Finca Alegría
title: (30396) Espacio Finca Alegría
description:
Welcome to Espacio Finca Alegria, a campsite at camper park prices! The last kilometer is a country road, of course it is not a highway, but the road is paved, vehicles of 12 meters and even more can pass. Additionally, there is another path to leave, or for larger vehicles. Some comments are exaggerated, if in doubt, look at the photos ;-)

Always open, contact us or come directly whenever you want. Pool included, open 24/365. We are next to the Sierra de la Muela and Cabo Tiñoso Natural Park. 6 km walk from El Portús beach (8 km by bike and 10 km by car), just 3 km from a town with all services and 10 km from the center of Cartagena, with a multitude of leisure and cultural options. There is a bus stop 20 minutes walk away or you can rent one of our cars for very little money.
------
Cafeteria - restaurant, delicious tapas and menus at popular prices.
------
General service:
- 1 motorhome / caravan / camper.
- 2 people.
- Drinking water.
- Drain.
- Electricity .
- Free WiFi 2MB and premium WiFi 12MB (paid).
- Free toilets (WC) and showers (hot water).
- Extra child.
- Extra adult.
-----
PRICES IN THE PHOTOS. ATTENTION, ON CHRISTMAS AND EASTER WEEK, LONG STAY GUESTS WILL PAY LOW SEASON PRICES.
----
Check-in from 9:00 a.m. at 10:00 p.m. Departures until 12:00 p.m. (until 4:00 p.m. if you eat in our cafeteria) // It is possible to leave until 10:00 p.m. paying 50%.
----
Massage service from €19: Relieving and relaxing.
Optional activities: yoga, relaxation and meditation, belly dance, tango, Tai chi.
----
Suitable for groups and special events (not parties).
---
Store of organic foods and other products.
----
Professional self-service laundry. Washing and drying in 1 hour and 15 minutes.

title: (30393) Cartagena - 20 Pasaje los Marines
description:
Near the see, on the Hill you can stay here alone with great view,
be careful in entrance, after that only bumpy road

title: (30393) El Portús - 75 Ronda Norte

name: Area Caravanas Home
title: (30393) Area Caravanas Home
description: We want to welcome you to Area Camper Caravanas Home in Cartagena with easy access from nac- 332 and highway A space where you will feel at home. Drainage of gray and black water Drinking water supply Electricity 24h security service Free Wi-Fi Laundry Showers Meeting room with coffee and soft drink vending machines Tourist information point Rent a car service Children's area Home bread service Direct access from national 500m: supermarket, gas station, pharmacy, veterinarian, itv, mechanical workshop, hairdresser, tobacconist, doctor, restaurants, and many more services …… .. Waste collection: (batteries, cooking oil, batteries, etc. Soon sale of supplies for motorhomes barbecue area play area picnic area with trees vip area and common area Vehicle sales; motorhomes and camper

title: (30393) Cartagena - 2 Pasaje el Portus -Ds Perín
description: Next to the naturist camping, small path to a nude/mix beach. Really nice view and pleasant beach. Lot of people come here for a walk or lay on the beach. Might be a bit noisy during the day because visitors of the beach and some fisherman park their car here.

title: (30815) Campo López -
description: Slightly offset from the road, an area for 2 or 3 vans. View of the mountains (not spectacular anyway). Absolute calm, a few cyclists on the road.

title: (30889) Águilas - 38 RM-D15
description: Mora Turtle Beach RV Park. Camper place directly on the beach. Quiet area surrounded by fields. Chiringuito, good food, unbeatable location on the beach. Bread is available from 10:30 a.m. at reception. Supermarket and shops 2.5 km

title: (30332) Balsapintada - 50 Pasaje Jacintos
description: Near a petrol station, to sleep very quiet, no problems with the Station, I asked the owner

title: (30850) Totana - 2 Calle Ojo Peralta
description: Huge parking lot (can accommodate more than 500 trucks). Great to spend the night if you are passing through or have to work on your camper as there is an adjacent industrial area. The ground is gravel. If you are all the way in the back you hear almost no traffic.

title: (30889) Águilas - 26 Diseminado Cope
description: Quiet place, very close to the road, the sea is also very close. It does not have a sandy beach. Lots of flies.

title: (30815) Lorca - 363 Diseminado Aguaderas
description: Wide esplanade of land next to the hermitage, among olive trees. 13 km from Lorca, and on the road that goes to Campo López. There is little shade. Fairly level ground. We had a very quiet night.

title: (30848) Alhama de Murcia - Autovía del Mediterráneo
title_short: (30848) Alhama de Murcia - Autovía del Mediterráneo
description: Access to water, but probably no drinking water. Petrol station (Repsol), motorway restaurant and playground

title: (30848) Alhama de Murcia - Autovía del Mediterráneo
title_short: (30848) Alhama de Murcia - Autovía del Mediterráneo
description: Rest area with public fountain. Gas station. Gray and black cast iron. Water filling in the coin column. Washing for motorhomes. Burger King restaurant. Restaurant cafeteria. Large car park. South orientation.

title: (30205) Cartagena - 2 Lugar la Cañada
description:
We can only confirm the positive impressions of the owner and services. Pleasantly quiet at night.
The hike to Mirdor de Roldan (5 km) is highly recommended.

The facility is still under construction, a screen for the commercial part of the site would still be important.

title: (30205) Cartagena - 14 Lugar la Cañada
description: Parking where vehicles are usually left for the ascent to Roldán and more routes, very quiet during the week, it is usually full on weekends, far from the center but with a nearby bus stop

name: Camping Totana

description: , 27 Lugar Lebor Alto

title: (30205) Cartagena - 33 Paraje la Cañada
description: Quiet parking from which to start hiking trails, a good bar 200m away "el kiosko Miguel", closed from 10:00 p.m. to 7:00 a.m.

title: (30850) -
description:
Totana south service station. Wide esplanade. Truck parking. Peaceful place. The noise of the highway is heard, although we have rested well.
Shower in the gas station.

title: (30889) Calabardina - 12 Calle Golondrina
description: Perfect for an overnight stay. very quiet high-end residential area. flat ground and garbage nearby.

title: (30850) - 154 Diseminado Lebor Bajo
description: New motorhome area and service area. You can refuel, spend the night, it has toilets (very clean), showers, laundry, children's play area, pet wash, caravan wash and the shop/cafeteria is open 24 hours. If you do not spend the night you also have access to the services but some with a small cost. The girls are very nice.

title: (30889) Calabardina - 2 Calle la Dorada
description: Large parking space close to the sea. Quiet at night.

title: (30889) Águilas - 19 Calle Abenarabi
description: Pitch with sea view

title: (30889) Calabardina - 19 Calle Vicente Aleixandre
description: Mixed tarmac parking accessible to any size motorhome 150 meters from the beach Trash cans Night lighting Quiet residential area

title: (30889) Calabardina - 2 Calle Canalicas
description: Public parking on the beach.

title: (30889) Águilas - RM-D15
description: Easy parking next to the coastal road on the beach. Sea view, 1.5 km to a supermarket and bakery. Garbage disposal in the village, 500 m. Do not park on the sea side, it is forbidden. Good, wide access. No overnight.

title: (30815) Lorca/Aguaderas - Carretera Malvaloca 174
description: Private parking space on a fenced plot

title: (30205) Cartagena - 9 Pasaje Subida Coto
description: Quiet parking in front of a foundation, little traffic, only a few walkers and joggers. The foundation building is empty at night. Quiet on Friday evening. Trash available. Three flat seats and possible access between two trees, paying attention to the lower branches.

title: (30153) La Murta - 1 Camino Sierra
description: Parking lot on the outskirts of La Murta, therefore very quiet. The bakery and playground are within walking distance in the small village and from the parking lot. Ideal starting point for hikes / bike tours in the Sierra of Carrescoy.

title: (30205) Cartagena - 35 Pasaje los Blases
description: Fuel station, very Cheap, next to shell called Raspoil, also LPG refilling station

title: (30205) Cartagena - 26 Avenida del Cantón
description: The parking lot of an abandoned shopping center. A parking lot (also abandoned) with no time or cost limit. There are surveillance cameras, but they are probably not active. a quiet place to rest and practically no noise. Highly recommended.

title: (30205) Cartagena - 2W Carretera de Tentegorra
description: Fresh water must also be paid for separately. Wifi was not available. Very noisy road nearby.

name: Camper Park AlyBOX

description: Parking for caravans and motorhomes.

title: (30205) Cartagena - 8 Calle Camelias
description: Parking place to visit Cartagena

title: (30310) Cartagena - 5 Finca la Perdiz
description: Very cheap gasoline station diesel GASOLEO A0.98ct / Possibility of washing for motorhome

title: (30310) Cartagena - 6 Calle Conesa Calderón
description: Laundry with 3 machines and 2 very clean dryers

title: (30310) Cartagena - 10 Pasaje Estacion Servicio
description: Laundry Wash

title: (30205) Algameca Chica -
description:
Make sure you go and check first if it's not occupied. otherwise it's hard to turn around the car. the last 20m of the road are quite rocky. not for everyone may be. 

the area is perfekt for hiking. swimming possible as well. 

very quite. good for 1 motorhome or 2 cars

title: (30205) Cartagena - 14 Calle Sebastián Ferignan
description: Parking with shade of trees, we have spent the day here to escape the sun and have a bit of shade, quite passed but calm, nobody has said anything to us. Next to a road. It has a garbage container and it smells a little but nothing serious. On the corner of the street there is a Shell where you have different services such as laundry, filling and emptying tanks, refueling with gasoline and LPG, washing cars and vans.

title: (30310) Cartagena -
description: Washing-Dryer

title: (30205) Cartagena - 30 Poligono Rambla de Benipila
description: Parking of football field ... near the city to visit and we can sleep without problems

name: Area Autocaravanas Cartagena
title: (30310) Area Autocaravanas Cartagena
description:
Open from September 1st ⚠️Closed in the summer months June/July/August⚠️
Bus No. 7 at 300m every 10 minutes to the historic center 5 km from Plaza España.
Bike lanes to the city center.
Taxi service.
Information
 Lots of fun and services (shops, restaurants and markets) 400m away in Polígono res Santa Ana.
Price that includes, in addition to the water change, Wi-Fi, showers and there is even a small living room with a coffee maker and microwave where you can watch TV or sit and chat if the day is rainy.
Dogs are welcome and they have a large garden. Automatic door and 24-hour video surveillance. Laundry, sinks, barbecue, showers, toilets, wifi.|
Normal pitch: price/day (wifi, showers, drinking water loading and unloading, all included).
XXL plot: price / day (electricity, wifi, showers, drinking water loading and unloading, all included).
Ask about discounts on stays of 15 days and 30 days.

title: (30205) Cartagena - 8 Calle Juana Jugan
description:
Off street
war able to get parking here after 2pm when the naval yard workers vacated . could probably spent the the night but a lot of road noise. Good sport to visit the town as parking difficult to find in Cartagena

title: (30850) Diputación de Mortí - 389 Lugar Morti Alto
title_short: (30850) Diputación de Mortí - 389 Lugar Morti Alto
description: CAMPERSTOP SIERRA ESPUÑA. TOTANA. This stop over is featured in All the Aires (84). It has one shower which is clean, 5 minutes use, pay via a box on wall. The owner is very friendly and lives next door. Excellent stop for mountain biking and walking.

title: (30816) La Hoya - 94 N-340a
description: Washing machine. Parking for small van, but there are places in the streets.

title: (30816) La Hoya - 33 Avenida Rey Juan Carlos I
title_short: (30816) La Hoya - 33 Avenida Rey Juan Carlos I
description: Simple parking without service. trade nearby restaurant 50M. calm during the day despite the road. very quiet night

title: (30204) Cartagena - 16 Avenida Reina Victoria Eugenia
description: Very clean laundry room with free internet connection

title: (30204) Cartagena - s/n Calle Jorge Juan
description: Free parking (white line), lengthwise, standard size width. 15 minutes from downtown walking. In front of the Hospital de la Caridad. We have slept several times without problems.

name: Camperpark
title: (30880) Camperpark
description: Dümo Camperpark Aguilas, the site was taken over and renovated by Dümo on 9/1/22. The owner is a German company, the employees here are multilingual, Spanish, French, English, German. The space is very spacious and also offers space for liners. Bar with small gastronomy and baguette service. Many recreational opportunities, private pool, boules court, bike paths, hiking. Shops and Aguilas about 3 km. To the sea about 2 km. Beautiful location on the hill with great views and very quiet.

title: (30203) Cartagena - 10 Calle Ribera de San Javier
title_short: (30203) Cartagena - 10 Calle Ribera de San Javier
description: Parking only. 8 minutes walk from the Center. Good for visiting the city and staying overnight Wednesday there are plenty of flea market cars on the adjoining square.

title: (30203) Cartagena - 2D Calle Ribera de San Javier
title_short: (30203) Cartagena - 2D Calle Ribera de San Javier
description:
In front of the Cenit shopping center, several free car parks and a blue zone. In the morning, there are police but they do not ask you anything.
Wednesdays market day - closed

title: (30204) Cartagena - 1 Ronda Ciudad de la Unión
title_short: (30204) Cartagena - 1 Ronda Ciudad de la Unión
description: Hypermarket parking. It has about 150 seats. In front of a Repsol that has laundry. An MC Donald's right in front. The center is about 3km walking.

title: (30840) Alhama de Murcia - 3 Calle México
description: Finally a self-service laundry where it is easy to park, even for big motorhomes. The laundry chain is one of the cheapest and very efficient. Prices on photos.

title: (30840) Alhama de Murcia - 121A Avenida Gines Campos
title_short: (30840) Alhama de Murcia - 121A Avenida Gines Campos
description: Large car park at the entrance coming from Totana, visit the castle. bathrooms of the archaeological museum ... It is close to the Mercadona shopping center, next door, and the Café el Circulo.

title: (30202) Cartagena - 30 Paseo Alfonso XII
description: Parking in the center 2 minutes you are at the port and 2 minutes you are in the historic center ... quiet right in front of plaza del toro and the university ... (video surveillance)

title: (30203) Cartagena - 3 Ronda de Ferrol
description: Quiet parking next to the municipal library. Ideal for Camper, not for large motorhome. Part a bike path to the center. Walking to the historic center is ten minutes. There are no bodyguards, it's free. Opposite there is a good and cheap bar to eat, have breakfast ... Pharmacy and bakery nearby.

title: (30202) Cartagena - 1 Calle Pez Espada
description: Parking close to the harbour. On workdays it is very busy but free. Arrive late and don't be surprised when a local watchman ask 1 euro fir the night safety. We spent a night without any problem.

title: (30203) Cartagena - C. Hermano Pedro Ignacio
description: Parking with large spaces, free, without caps. It is at the door of a nursing home, a school and the municipal library. Ten minutes from the old town. In the library there are toilets, Wi-Fi and free newspapers, as well as exhibitions and talks. At night it is quiet, during the day it is noisy. Very close to Mercadona, bars and a hospital.

title: (30202) Cartagena - 32A Paseo Alfonso XII
description: Parking on the street without disposal and without supply. Here are many shady characters around. That's why we will not spend the night here. It would have been possible. Good for a day visit to the historic old town.

title: (30202) Cartagena - 8B Paseo del Muelle
description: Parking area adjacent to 2 restaurants in the port area. No restrictions at all. Next to noisy road and would be noisy overnight but we used it for day parking. Close to town for historic areas.

title: (30202) Cartagena - 9B Paseo del Muelle
description: Parking with parking attendant, overnight stay possible

title: (30202) Cartagena - 9 Paseo Delicias
description: Parking along the street. super quiet. 5 minutes from the historic center.

title: (30203) Cartagena - S/N Paseo Alfonso XIII
description: Free drinking water at the Carrefour station

title: (30202) Cartagena - 8 Paseo del Muelle
description: Small parking at the edge of a road, but quiet enough, (I slept there on a Sunday evening in July) a little shady.

title: (30202) Cartagena - 11 N-343
description: Parking for about 40 cars, sometimes a little sloping. According to locals, there are no problems here. restaurat right next to it

title: (30203) Cartagena - 4 Avenida Pintor Portela
description:
"La Lavanderia"
Laundromat in Catagena
12 kg for 5 euros 18 kg for 7 euros
Dryer 1 euro for 8 min.
For example, you can park at Lidl for 1 hour for free, if you buy something for more than 15 euros you can stand there for 2 hours for free. Alternatively, you can also park briefly at the Carrefour

title: (30840) Alhama de Murcia - Rambla Don Diego (Recinto Ferial)
title_short: (30840) Alhama de Murcia - Rambla Don Diego (Recinto Ferial)
description: Great parking in the center of town. Accessible to large motorhomes. Asphalted and flat. No problem to spend the night. During the day there is a lot of traffic but without disturbing. In the quiet night. Close to shops, restaurants and services. Public toilets very close, on the ground floor of the town hall square. Tuesday is market day, do not park, Monday do not spend the night. During the local festivities it is occupied as a Fairground.

title: (30880) Águilas - 35 Calle A
description: The right side of the street that goes down to the yellow beach is full of parking, it is on a steep slope

title: (30202) - 2 Pasaje Cala Cortina
description: Land parking, quieter than the one opposite, access to a restaurant that is in the middle of the cove, access to the beach

title: (30202) Cartagena - 28 Paseo del Muelle
description: Potable water (although the taste is not good), footswitch.  There is a car park opposite the street.

title: (30202) Cartagena - 7 Calle Pedro Jorquera
description: Small parking lot next to noisy road, suitable for smaller campervans. I left my van here for the day and had no problems. Nobody asked to pay anything.

title: (30203) Cartagena - 7D Calle Juan Muñoz Delgado
description: Repsol garage which sells LPG and connectors

title: (30840) Alhama de Murcia - 71A Avenida de Antonio Fuertes
title_short: (30840) Alhama de Murcia - 71A Avenida de Antonio Fuertes
description: For a stopover not far from the highway. large, slightly sloping car park next to the information point and a few flatter car spaces between this car park and what we believe to be a crematorium. near the cemetery. we had a quiet night. background noise (motorway? air conditioning motors?) not bothersome. in our opinion only for a stage without any unpacking and remaining discreet.

title: (30202) Cartagena - 14 Avenida Sánchez Meca
description: Place next to main road, so it's litle bit noise, but no one want money from you for park here. To city center is 15 minutes by foot.

title: (30880) Murcia - C. Azorin
description: Mixed car park 150 meters from the beach, quiet area, good for one night, accessible to any size of motorhome in the off season Garbage cans

title: (30840) Alhama de Murcia - 1 Calle Ermita Padre Manuel
title_short: (30840) Alhama de Murcia - 1 Calle Ermita Padre Manuel
description: I spent the night in Alhama before going up to Sierra Espuña and I found this place open to the ferias ... it has no services of any kind but I have slept calmly and without discomfort. It is very close to the center of town and you can see its castle which I think you can walk up.

title: (30880) Águilas - 2 Calle H
description: We didn't like the Herillo car park, too many vehicles passing through. We slept here with another German motorhome. We were not disturbed.

title: (30816) Lorca - Unnamed Road
description: Perfect and very quiet place to stop to eat. There are picnic tables, a place to have barbecues and if you go up to the church and the viewpoint, you have beautiful views of the valley. We stop to eat because it is 5 minutes from the highway, it is very quiet, it does not have services.

name: E.S. Repsol La Manga Oil Torreciega
title: (30392) E.S. Repsol La Manga Oil Torreciega
title_short: (30392) E.S. Repsol La Manga Oil Torreciega
description: An excellent place to wash the motorhome. Two large areas with walkways/gantrys. Very reasonable price. Quite close to Area Autocaravannas, where we stopped on several occasions.

title: (30202) Cartagena - 1 Plaza Castillo de San Julian
title_short: (30202) Cartagena - 1 Plaza Castillo de San Julian
description: Best view point. and perfect flat parkings long road and 4x4 only. My car is 6 m,worked.  nice breeze . Did not see any signs.

title: (30880) Águilas - 13 Avenida del Hornillo
description: Small parking lot on the beach at the mosaic steps of Hornillo. Nearby is a very large P place for possible. larger motorhomes. No amenities. But out of season I don't foresee any problems staying overnight.

title: (30840) Alhama de Murcia - Av. de Antonio Fuertes
title_short: (30840) Alhama de Murcia - Av. de Antonio Fuertes
description: Relatively steep and narrow gravel road, but managable with a regular van. The view is amazing, but it was very dirty when we arrived. Space for 2/3 vans. We cleaned up as much as possible and spent a very quiet night.

title: (30859) Totana -
description: Parking at Mirador del Corazón de Jesús. Beautiful view. 1 or 2 fairly flat places, others strongly inclined.

title: (30880) Águilas - 1 Calle B
description: Parking for several dozen cars next to the shopping center where you can use the toilet. About two minutes to walk to the beach. Quiet and peaceful at night.

title: (30859) Totana - C-7
description: Beautiful picnic area on the small road that leads to the statue of Jesus. Many possibilities of barbecue and places to sit. Parking only at designated locations, but there is no prohibition! There are two parking spaces, one about 50 meters after the roundabout and the other a little higher. Great place. One could use the toilets from the next location (parking), near the church, walk maybe 5 minutes.

title: (30880) Águilas - 210L Calle Goleta
description: Parking for the day. Next to the beach and a short walk from town.  No restrictions   Gets busy with locals visiting the beach.  Not recommend if it is rainy weather

title: (30859) Totana - RM-502
description: The Sanctuary of Santa Eulalia in Totana, Sierra de Espuña, was one of our discoveries in our first AC experience. Precise place, quiet and secluded. There is a bar that closes at night and a huge parking lot and toilets. It is worth the visit to the sanctuary and sleep in silence among pines is priceless

title: (30859) Totana - RM-502
description: Picnic area near the sanctuary has barbecues, toilets and drinking water source. No flat surface to sleep. Not very big and might be busy during weekends. Good to make manual service of waters but overnight stay better at sanctuary parking.

title: (30840) Murcia - 1 Diseminado Sierra Muela
description: Area to spend, near the viewpoint of the mill.

title: (30880) Águilas - 23 Calle Murcia
description: Plot of land within Águilas, spacious and quiet for parking, with a slight unevenness. I spent 3 nights during the carnivals and without problems, or any noise, 15min walk from the center.

title: (30880) Águilas - 1 Camino del Cementerio
description: Camino del Cementerio, Aguilas

title: (30813) Purias - Camino Guirao 10
description: Here in southern Spain, between the town of Lorca and the port town of Aguilas, there is a small private camper place. A maximum of four campers can be accommodated here. The plot is scrap and the maximum length of the mobile home is 8.50 m. The site is completely fenced. A large well-kept swimming pool is available until the end of October. Next to the pool there is a large pavilion shower (hot/cold) for free use. A fully equipped communal kitchen is available. A service station is available. One adult per night 10 euros, each additional (from 14 years) 5 euros, children 2.50 € (up to 13 years) One dog is free, each additional dog 1.50 € From the 30th day the costs are reduced 20% Electricity is billed individually per kilowatt hour at €0.40, use of the washing machine costs €2.50, WiFi is available in the common area. The property is located on the outskirts of Purias, on the border with Andalusia, with excellent transport links in a quiet rural area. In just 20 minutes by car you are at the sea or in 10 minutes in Lorca. Here you will find everything your heart desires, modern shopping centers, banks, pharmacies, cafes, bars, restaurants and so on. Feel free to contact us by phone, WhatsApp or email
